name: Spoon the boon
description:
*welcome too the one and only world of spoon

An innocent little spoon wants to plant a carrot in north korea for his grand parents but a evil clown wants to stop it for some reason. looking for answers, spoon and co wants to find out why.


  • funny memes
  • complex battles
  • cool ass stolen music
  • alot of references of older games.
  • some old faces from previous games made by me.
  • Basic rpg maker gameplay with a few modifications

if you liked the game share it with your friends fams
psychologist, or your social media page, if your lazy, do it anyway
maybe its for the best, so yeah have fun lads.

and also follow my instagram ifunny youtuber etc would be epic.
